definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: The outlook for both markets is uncertain.
sentences.chinese: 这两个市场的前景并不明朗。

sentences.english: Jihoo is so happy to see Jandi's brilliant smile when she can get the "meat" prize!
sentences.chinese: 智厚很幸福看丝草明朗笑容，她获得肉奖品的时候。

sentences.english: This will be announced to the world tomorrow, putting an end to the whole saga .
sentences.chinese: 明天整个世界将明朗，这段传奇故事划上句号。

sentences.english: Love is the little red umbrella in rainy days, under the umbrella it is always sunny days.
sentences.chinese: 爱情是风雨中的那把小红伞，伞下永远是明朗的天。

sentences.english: As the job outlook brightens, consumer sentiment should perk up, too.
sentences.chinese: 随着就业前景明朗化，消费信心也将振作起来。

sentences.english: But in summer, their romantic life will not be that unambiguous.
sentences.chinese: 夏天，浪漫生活将不会那么明朗。

sentences.english: It was a fine dry night, frost in the air .
sentences.chinese: 那是个明朗无雾的夜，霜气凛人。

sentences.english: In the hours to come everything will be clear," he said.
sentences.chinese: 在未来几个小时内，一切都会明朗化。

sentences.english: The circumstances of Bergdahl's abduction remain unclear.
sentences.chinese: 这起绑架案的具体情况仍不明朗。

sentences.english: The sky overhead throbbed and pulsed with light.
sentences.chinese: 天色清澈明朗，阳光温暖。

sentences.english: The feeling of 2 people also by at the beginning delicate mood arrives Anacreontic with each passing day.
sentences.chinese: 二人的感情也由一开始的微妙情绪到日渐明朗。

sentences.english: However, high-pressure boiler tubes expert analysis, market prospects for recovery uncertain.
sentences.chinese: 但高压锅炉管专家分析认为，市场复苏前景还不明朗。

sentences.english: There may be uncertainties about Tung Chee-hwa's political future in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 董建华在香港的政治前途可能并不明朗。

sentences.english: Once you know Tonghui and Tonghui people, you will get the exact answer.
sentences.chinese: 在了解了通惠公司和通惠人后，答案便很明朗。

sentences.english: However, the world economic recovery is not strong and its prospects are not clear.
sentences.chinese: 但世界经济复苏的动力不强，前景尚不明朗。

sentences.english: Whether Saab will survive in the long term is less clear.
sentences.chinese: 萨博能否长治久安尚不明朗。

definition: "Red Poppies", novel by 阿來|阿来[A1 lai2]
lit. the dust has settled (idiom)/fig. to get sorted out/to be finalized
to become more and more/to gradually become
